com.xorprogramming.game

Interface GameEventListener<T1 extends GameEngine<T2>,T2>

  • Type Parameters:
    T1 - The type of GameEngine that triggers events
    T2 - The type of result from a game event

    public interface GameEventListener<T1 extends GameEngine<T2>,T2>
    A listener interface for responding to game events.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Steven Roberts

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onGameEvent(T2 t, T1 engine)
      Called when a generic game event occurs in a GameEngine
      void onGameOver(boolean win)
      Called when a GameEngine determines that the game is over
      void onRenderException(RenderException ex)
      Called when a RenderException is thrown by a GameRenderer

    • Method Detail

      • onGameEvent

        void onGameEvent(T2 t,
               T1 engine)
        Called when a generic game event occurs in a GameEngine
        Parameters:
        t - Data related to the event
        engine - The GameEngine that triggered the event

      • onRenderException

        void onRenderException(RenderException ex)
        Called when a RenderException is thrown by a GameRenderer
        Parameters:
        ex - The thrown exception

      • onGameOver

        void onGameOver(boolean win)
        Called when a GameEngine determines that the game is over
        Parameters:
        win - true if the game was won, false if the game was lost
